method.name: Iterative Prototype Adjustment based on Differential Evolution

reference.ref: I. Triguero, S. Garc√≠a, F. Herrera, IPADE: Iterative Prototype Adjustment for Nearest Neighbor Classification. IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks, doi: 10.1109/TNN.2010.2087415, in press (2010).

generalDescription.type: Preprocess Method. Data Reduction. Prototype Generation. Positioning Adjustment.
generalDescription.objective: Reduce the size of the training set without losing precision or accuracy in order to a posterior classification
generalDescription.howWork: IPADE follows an iterative scheme in which it determines the most appropriate number of prototypes per class and their best positioning. Concretely, IPADE is divided into threedifferent stages: initialization, optimization and addition of prototypes

parameterSpec.param: Strategy: A number between 1-6, It indicates the mutation strategy, 1: Rand/1, 2: Best/1, 3: RandTobest/1, 4: Best/2, 5: Rand/2 6:RandToBest/2.
Crossover Type: You can select between the three existing crossover operators.
